content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure contains approximately 12-13 blocks arranged in 3 main layers:
- Bottom layer: Red arch blocks forming a base
- Middle layer: Cubes and cylindrical blocks
- Top layer: Roof elements and tall blocks

## Spatial Relationships
The structure resembles a small toy town or train with:
- A red base with arch-shaped openings (2 arches side by side)
- Two house-like structures with orange triangular roofs
- Blue and orange cube sections forming the body of houses
- Yellow cylindrical blocks in the middle
- Yellow rectangular/cube blocks and green blocks at the back/top

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the main image, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:

1. Block 1 - Red arch block (left side of base)
2. Block 2 - Red arch block (right side of base)
3. Block 5 - Blue cube (for left house body)
4. Block 7 - Orange cube (for right house body)
5. Block 6 - Green cube (middle section)
6. Block 6 - Green cube (second green cube)
7. Block 8 - Tall green rectangular block (back right)
8. Block 9 - Tall green rectangular block (back left)
9. Block 12 - Tall yellow rectangular block (back right)
10. Block 12 - Tall yellow rectangular block (back left)
11. Block 14 - Yellow semi-cylindrical block (middle section)
12. Block 14 - Yellow semi-cylindrical block (middle section)
13. Block 15 - Orange triangular roof (left house)
14. Block 16 - Orange triangular roof (right house)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 1
   Step2: Move block with index 2
   Step3: Move block with index 5
   Step4: Move block with index 7
   Step5: Move block with index 14
   Step6: Move block with index 14
   Step7: Move block with index 6
   Step8: Move block with index 6
   Step9: Move block with index 15
   Step10: Move block with index 16
   Step11: Move block with index 8
   Step12: Move block with index 9
   Step13: Move block with index 12
   Step14: Move block with index 12
}
```

The assembly follows a bottom-up approach, starting with the base arch blocks, then building the house structures, adding the middle elements, placing the roofs, and finally positioning the tall blocks at the back.
